name: Death Park
description:
In this horror game you will explore a huge abandoned amusement park with a creepy circus.

Will you be ready to face true evil - scary clown? Will you be able to solve all the puzzles that await you on the path to escape?

Explore a dark amusement park: old abandoned buildings, a horrifying hospital, scary basements, mysterious mazes and creepy circus.

Solve puzzles and search, collect, and use items in order to understand the horror story and survive in full of death park.

Do not make noise and be careful because a evil clown neighbor might see or hear you! It kills everyone who gets in its way! Keep your eyes open and use cover to hide from it to stay alive. Try to track its movements, otherwise it will find, scare, and kill you!

There are multiple endings in Death Park. Your decisions and actions will affect the outcome of the game. Play again to discover the other endings.

This scary game features:

★ A stunning original plot with multiple endings
★ A huge map with 7 locations to explore
★ A terrifying and crafty evil clown
★ Hardcore puzzles
★ Best horror: intense gameplay, unexpected encounters, and a nightmarish atmosphere

Note: We recommend playing with headphones on.

If you know how to improve this survival horror game - just leave feedback! If you want to help us with the translation of this scary game, just message us!

Enjoy one of the best scary games!
